statement.p: In 75 of the last 24 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{24}}={0.75}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{24}. \displaystyle{P}={0.75}\cdot{24}={18}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 24-18=6 We round that as requested to 6.
